Now we want that every soul in this congregation shall make a covenant with our God by sacrifice, right in this room, to make a covenant that they will study the Word. Let your magazines go. Why, here the magical books were burned. As we read away back in the days of persecution of Paul, and the apostles were laboring, they brought out their magical books, and they burned them. I think if you would clear your house, many of you, of all these magazines, with the ridiculous pictures in them, those representations are as 


                                     -284- 

it were from Satan, and we do not want them; we do not want those representations; we want the truth in our books, in our houses.--Ms 119, 1906, pp. 5, 8. (Sermon, May 5, 1906.)
